query: Hunter counted 50 cars packed in their school parking lot when entering class one morning. During the first break, he counted 8964097 more cars in the parking lot. When he got out of class for the lunch break, he realized that 1/2 the number of cars in the parking lot had gone. What's the total number of cars he counted during lunch break?

\]
